summary: A very specific mod made to change a child ghost voice in a quest Laid to Rest (See video)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#56a2e5][b][center]Ghostly Voice Laid to Rest[/center][/b][/color]

[color=#56a2e5][b]Descriptions:[/b][/color]
A very specific mod made to change a child ghost voice in a quest Laid to Rest from normal child voice to my own interpretation of what she (the ghost) should probably sounds like. Just because it been bugging me when I went through the quest & how she sounds like every other kids when you know, she\'s a ghost? See [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gnKj_QKoMMs][color=#aad0f2][b]video[/b][/color][/url] for more information of what this mod does.


[color=#56a2e5][b]Installation:[/b][/color]
Extract to Data folder or use NMM. No esp file... yet.


[color=#56a2e5][b]Versions:[/b][/color]
v1.1
Based on requests, I\'ve reduced the reverb but in exchange added a subtle effect which I hope would retain the otherworldly sound of the original without loosing clarity of the voice :)


[color=#56a2e5][b]Thank you for all the comments & feedbacks.[/b][/color]


[color=#56a2e5][b]My Other Mods:[/b][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10955][color=#aad0f2][b]Skyrim\'s Mark And Recall Teleport Spell[/b][/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7885][color=#aad0f2][b]Mystical Ice Spell Effects[/b][/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8395][color=#aad0f2][b]Natural Skyrim Rain[/b][/color][/url]
author: Nopheros
